definition: high denomination of banknotes or coins/lots of money/a big sum (e.g. a bribe)
big/huge/large/major/great/wide/deep/older (than)/oldest/eldest/greatly/very much/(dialect) father/father's elder or younger brother
coin/money/CL:筆|笔[bi3]/unit of weight, one tenth of a tael 兩|两[liang3]

sentences.english: Many top players from around the world earn big money playing in America’s NBA.
sentences.chinese: 很多頂尖的運動員通過在美國NBA中打球掙大錢。

sentences.english: My classmate has made lots of money since he quit his job and ventured into business last year.
sentences.chinese: 我同學去年辭職下海經商後掙了大錢。

sentences.english: This does not mean that you cannot make good money on a new form of online communication.
sentences.chinese: 這並不意味着你不能從網上交流的新形式上賺大錢。

sentences.english: Of course, child actors earn big money.
Sometimes Mr. Smith makes a lot of money when he plays the market, and sometimes he loses.
sentences.chinese: 史密斯先生做股票生意有時候賺大錢，有時候虧本。

sentences.english: And,of course,the little actors earn big money.
sentences.chinese: 當然，這些小演員就賺了大錢。

sentences.english: Here’s how one GRS reader uses haggling to save big bucks.
sentences.chinese: 這裏是一位讀者用來討價還價，存大錢的方法。

sentences.english: I know how to make money grow.
The opportunity to make real money excites you.
sentences.chinese: 你對賺大錢的機會感到無比興奮。

sentences.english: When she went to the kitchen for chili oil, I put the good- luck dumpling into her bowl.
sentences.chinese: 當她去廚房拿辣椒油時，我把大錢餃子放在她的碗裏。

sentences.english: Then become a festival volunteer and you could save yourself some serious dosh.
sentences.chinese: 果真如此，那就去當一名節日誌願者，你可以省大錢。

sentences.english: If you have the ability to save big, that is great.
sentences.chinese: 假如你有省大錢的習慣，那就真的是太棒了。

sentences.english: Tian mi in order to earn a lot of money, put the cheese give her 90000 dollars to buy the shares.
sentences.chinese: 田咪爲了掙大錢，把亞芝給她的9萬塊錢都買了股票。

sentences.english: People who have made serious money are colossally talented.
sentences.chinese: 那些真正賺了大錢的人肯定是極富天才的。

sentences.english: But curtail bonuses after a profitable year, and employees will grumble.
sentences.chinese: 但是在賺了大錢的年份限制獎金派發又會遭僱員抱怨。

sentences.english: Suite101 is a professional sitefor writers where you can earn a good income for your articles.
sentences.chinese: Suite101是個作者們能賺到大錢的專業網站。

definition: variant of 佣錢|佣钱[yong4 qian5]
silver currency/currency of the Qing dynasty based on the silver tael 兩|两
to struggle to get free/to strive to acquire/to make (money)
What can you have against it? (idiom)/We should do this./Go for it!
unimportant/not serious/it doesn't matter/never mind/it looks all right, but
